scripts.platform-ios: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file platform.js --bundle-output ./ios/platform.ios.bundle --assets-dest ./ios/ --config platform59.config.js
scripts.app1-ios: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./ios/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest ./ios/ --config app59.config.js
scripts.app2-ios: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index2.js --bundle-output ./ios/index2.ios.bundle --assets-dest ./ios/ --config app59.config.js
scripts.app3-ios: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index3.js --bundle-output ./ios/index3.ios.bundle --assets-dest ./ios/ --config app59.config.js
scripts.platform-android: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file platform.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/platform.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/src/main/res/ --config platform59.config.js
scripts.app1-android: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/src/main/res/ --config app59.config.js
scripts.app2-android: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index2.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/index2.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/src/main/res/ --config app59.config.js
scripts.app3-android: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index3.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/index3.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/src/main/res/ --config app59.config.js
